reviewText: I'm an atheist, but I still don't appreciate some of the unnecessary stuff DK insists on adding to their Eyewitness DVD series. I'll introduce Shakespeare references to witches and spells when and if I decide to do so; it should have no place as part of an educational show about Amphibians.
Not suitable to show to children because it claims Darwinism as a fact when in reality it is only a theory and therefore not a valid science video.
my daughter loves this video as she is going to get a toad soon.  the eyewitness DVDs are educational and I love that my daughter will pick them over most any other video :)
Fits 7th grade Next Gen Science curriculum perfectly.
